targets.expr:
sum(
            (ic_apitype:hypervisor_executed_messages_total:rate1m
            {api_type="non replicated query", ic="mercury"})
            or
            (ic_icsubnet_apitype:sandboxed_execution_executed_message_slices_total:rate1m
            {api_type="non replicated query", ic="mercury"})
        )

sum(
(ic_apitype:hypervisor_executed_messages_total:rate1m
{api_type!="non replicated query", ic="$ic", ic_subnet="$ic_subnet"})
or
(ic_icsubnet_apitype:sandboxed_execution_executed_message_slices_total:rate1m
{api_type!="non replicated query", ic="$ic", ic_subnet="$ic_subnet"})
)

sum(
(ic_apitype:hypervisor_executed_messages_total:rate1m
{api_type!="non replicated query", ic="$ic"})
or
(ic_icsubnet_apitype:sandboxed_execution_executed_message_slices_total:rate1m
{api_type!="non replicated query", ic="$ic"})
)
